mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Norton, George W. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Norton, George W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 8 1863. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 8 1863. AM) Send to this place immediately one hundred & fifty 150 guns ammunition for same also ball screws and wipers & one thousand 1000 gun slings - have no reliable information to communicate. Geo W Norton 29W92 Coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Norton, George W.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
